reviewContent: Great service and support! Eight really helped me out with my concern of the theme, that made a huge difference for our store. Really recommend Eight and their themes.
replyContent: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review, it means lot as a small business. We're so glad our support team could help you and we'll be passing the message onto them!

reviewContent: The theme didn't meet my expectations, but support was helpful in addressing my issues.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that the theme didn't meet your expectations, but we're glad our support team could assist you. We appreciate your feedback!
